EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining us at Gartner AADI last week!
Pivotal is passionate about partnering with customers to overcome challenges associated with lengthy enterprise IT cycles. With a proven portfolio of methodologies, a powerful platform <[[https://pivotal.io/platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-gartner-aadi-uk-q218]]>, and open-source data and analytics software, Pivotal works with customers to implement new approaches and modern tools to build great software.
Until we meet again, here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/gartner-aadi-london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-gartner-aadi-uk-q218]]> are some resources to start you on your journey. And, for more white papers, webinars, eBooks, and case studies, check out our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-gartner-aadi-uk-q218]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team It's time to level-up. Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-gartner-aadi-uk-q218]]> to pick up new skills and new ideas for delivering exceptional user experiences. Register here <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-gartner-aadi-uk-q218]]> with the following discount code to get $100 off posted price: Attendee_Event_100
